name: TRASH DESTROYER
description:
Go to a trash yard and DESTROY IT ALL!!!!!

Trash Destroyer is a game where you can take flight in a test plane and prepare to drop bombs on all of the trash.

This game was made for the Destruction Jam but will still be worked on in the future.

Features:

 *A plane

 *A bomb

 *A trash town

 *ENDLESS DESTRUCTION

Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse:

*Move: WASD

*Drop Bomb: [Space]

*Pause: Esc

*You can use a  controller but you will need a mouse to move around on pause and main menu
